info.title: Roa API
info.description: API documentation for a Mart chain with JWT Authentication

post.summary: Log the user out (Invalidate the token)
post.description: Logs out the current user and invalidates their JWT token

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all branches, optionally filtered by search term

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter branches by name or location

get.description: Retrieve a single branch by ID

put.description: Update an existing branch by ID

delete.description: Soft delete a branch by ID

post.description: Create a new branch with name, location, and contact number
Restore a previously soft-deleted branch by ID

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all categories
Retrieve a single category by ID
Retrieve a paginated list of all invoices, optionally filtered by user_id

post.description: Create a new invoice with user ID and total

get.description: Retrieve a single invoice by ID

put.description: Update an existing invoice by ID

delete.description: Soft delete an invoice by ID

post.description: Restore a previously soft-deleted invoice by ID

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all invoice items, optionally filtered by invoice_id or product_id

parameters.name: invoice_id
parameters.description: Filter invoice items by invoice ID

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: Filter invoice items by product ID

post.description: Create a new invoice item with invoice ID, product ID, quantity, and price

get.description: Retrieve a single invoice item by ID

put.description: Update an existing invoice item by ID

delete.description: Soft delete an invoice item by ID

post.description: Restore a previously soft-deleted invoice item by ID

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all positions, optionally filtered by search term

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter positions by name or description

post.description: Create a new position with branch, name, and description

get.description: Retrieve a single position by ID

put.description: Update an existing position by ID

delete.description: Soft delete a position by ID

post.description: Restore a previously soft-deleted position by ID

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all products, optionally filtered by search term

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter products by name or description

post.description: Create a new product with name, cost, price, image, description, and category

get.description: Retrieve a single product by ID

put.description: Update an existing product by ID

delete.description: Soft delete a product by ID

post.description: Restore a previously soft-deleted product by ID

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all staff, optionally filtered by search term

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term to filter staff by name, gender, pob, address, phone, or nation_id_card

post.description: Create a new staff member with position, name, gender, date of birth, place of birth, address, phone, and national ID card

get.description: Retrieve a single staff member by ID

put.description: Update an existing staff member by ID

delete.description: Soft delete a staff member by ID

post.description: Restore a previously soft-deleted staff member by ID
